channel.title: TIME's 10 Questions Podcast
channel.copyright: Copyright @ 2010 Time Inc. All rights reserved.
channel.itunes:author: Time Magazine
channel.description: Each week, TIME asks 10 reader-submitted questions to the latest newsmakers including celebrities, politicians and world leaders. Have a question to ask a public figure? Check time.com/10questions weekly to submit your question and to see who'll be our next guest.
channel.itunes:summary: Each week, TIME asks 10 reader-submitted questions to the latest newsmakers including celebrities, politicians and world leaders. Have a question to ask a public figure? Check time.com/10questions weekly to submit your question and to see who'll be our next guest.
